home.title: Cultural pulse
home.subtitle: Do you really fit in where you live? Discover your social "tribe" and your ideal region based on real data.

questions.music_rock: From 0 to 10, how much do you like Rock music?
questions.music_classical: How much do you enjoy Classical music?
questions.music_traditional: How much do you enjoy Traditional/Folk music?
questions.politics_leftright: In politics, where do you place yourself?
questions.politics_environment: How important is environmental protection to you?
questions.politics_equality: Do you support measures to reduce economic inequality?
questions.values_authority: Does society need strict rules and strong authority?
questions.social_immigration: What is your opinion on immigration?
questions.culture_reading: How often do you read books?
questions.culture_sports: How important is sports in your life?
questions.food_adventurous: Do you like trying food from other countries?
questions.food_social: Do you enjoy eating out (bars, restaurants)?
questions.mobility_public: Do you regularly use public transportation?
questions.mobility_car: Do you use a car daily?
questions.identity_regional: Do you identify more with your region than with Spain?
questions.religiosity: How important is religion in your life?

results.share_failed: Could not share. Try copying the link.
results.share_twitter: Discover your cultural profile in Spain!
results.share_whatsapp: Check out my cultural profile in Spain!
results.closest_parties_info: The 3 political parties with positions closest to your political position.
results.tribe_desc: Your cultural consumption patterns and social values distinguish you from the national average, leaning towards a unique profile.
results.cultural_home_tooltip: Your ideal region calculated by comparing your answers with regional profiles from the NORPOL 2024 dataset (3,015 people).
results.similarity_tooltip: Cultural similarity index with the Spanish average (1-10). Measures your closeness to the national average profile in music, politics, social values, identity, culture, mobility and gastronomy. Higher value = closer to Spanish average.
results.regions_closer_text: out of 17 regions are closer to the average than you
results.comparison_desc: Comparison of your tastes with the average from the NORPOL 2024 study.
results.info: This analysis uses data from the Study on Social Norms in Politics 2024. Regional profiles have been calculated by aggregating responses from the 3,015 original participants and finding the smallest vector distance to your preferences.

attribution.title: Attribution
attribution.data_source: Data source: CSIC NORPOL 2024
attribution.libraries: Built with Next.js, Leaflet and Recharts

young_partygoer.name: Young Partygoer
young_partygoer.description: Urban music, party, nightlife, social networks

working_class_rooted.name: Rooted Working Class
working_class_rooted.description: Working class, local pride, football, popular traditions

liberal_cosmopolitan.name: Cosmopolitan Liberal
liberal_cosmopolitan.description: Global openness, international culture, individual freedoms, tolerance

nationalist_conservative.name: Nationalist Conservative
nationalist_conservative.description: National pride, traditional values, authority, family

economic_liberal.name: Economic Liberal
economic_liberal.description: Centre-right, entrepreneurship, economic freedom, socially tolerant

left_moderate.name: Moderate Left
left_moderate.description: Social democracy, equality, social rights, pragmatism

sports_enthusiast.name: Sports Enthusiast
sports_enthusiast.description: Active lifestyle, football, camaraderie, sporting events

regional_traditionalist.name: Regional Traditionalist
regional_traditionalist.description: Territorial identity, local customs, own language, community
